author: cmlenz
msg: Move the Gump descriptor into Gump CVS

author: cmlenz
msg: Tighten the build to work in Ant 1.6:
The Xerces JAR from the system classpath is not automatically inherited
to the forked JUnit tests, so Xerces needs to be on the project classpath.

author: cmlenz
msg: Thanks to Ias for noticing and providing a patch
